definition: Bao Zheng (999-1062), Northern Song official renowned for his honesty/modern day metaphor for an honest politician
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
surname Bao
to raise/to aid/to support/to save/to rescue

sentences.english: Roads in Bao's village were also paved with cement.
sentences.chinese: 包拯的村公路也被铺的水泥。
